title: NavigationService.Navigate() let us pass a parameter of type object along with the URI
body: If NavigationService.Navigate() would let us pass a parameter of type object along with the URI, it will help us to keep less states objects in the App class which will become a mess as project grows.

comments.body: Not only in WP but in all xaml stacks.  I never use the built in navigation system and write my own purely because of this problem
